source_sentence: 爾時釋迦牟尼佛放大人相肉髻光明，及放眉間白毫相光，遍照東方百八萬億那由他恒河沙等諸佛世界。
translation: It was then that Śākyamuni Buddha magnified his human-appearing flesh topknot and radiated a white-haired radiance between his eyebrows, shining everywhere in the east in a hundred and eight thousand million nayutas of the Gaṅgāsā world.

source_sentence: 過是數已，有世界名淨光莊嚴，其國有佛，號淨華宿王智如來、應供、正遍知、明行足、善逝、世間解、無上士、調御丈夫、天人師、佛、世尊，為無量無邊菩薩大眾恭敬圍繞而為說法，釋迦牟尼佛白毫光明遍照其國。
translation: After that number, there was a world called Vairocana-raśmi-pratimaṇḍitā, and in that world there was a Buddha named Jñānôlabhadra, Worthy of Offerings, Perfectly Omniscient, Perfectly Virtuous, Well Gone, Understander of the World, Unsurpassed Person, Trainer of Husbands, Teacher of Gods and People, Buddha, and World Honored One who was speaking to an immeasurable and limitless assembly of bodhisattvas while surrounded by respect and dignity, and the white-haired radiance of Śakyamuni Buddha was shining all over that country.

source_sentence: 爾時一切淨光莊嚴國中，有一菩薩名曰妙音，久已殖眾德本，供養親近無量百千萬億諸佛，而悉成就甚深智慧，得妙幢相三昧、法華三昧、淨德三昧、宿王戲三昧、無緣三昧、智印三昧、解一切眾生語言三昧、集一切功德三昧、清淨三昧、神通遊戲三昧、慧炬三昧、莊嚴王三昧、淨光明三昧、淨藏三昧、不共三昧、日旋三昧，得如是等百千萬億恒河沙等諸大三昧。
translation: 爾時一切淨光莊嚴國中，有一菩薩名曰妙音，久已殖眾德本，供養親近無量百千萬億諸佛，而悉成就甚深智慧，得妙幢相三昧、法華三昧、淨德三昧、宿王戲三昧、無緣三昧、智印三昧、解一切眾生語言三昧、集一切功德三昧、清淨三昧、神通遊戲三昧、慧炬三昧、莊嚴王三昧、淨光明三昧、淨藏三昧、不共三昧、日旋三昧，得如是等百千萬億恒河沙等諸大三昧。

source_sentence: 釋迦牟尼佛光照其身，即白淨華宿王智佛言：「世尊！
translation: Śakyamūṇi Buddha shone his light on his body and said to the Pure Flower King of Constellations, the Buddha of Wisdom, "Bhagavān!

source_sentence: 我當往詣娑婆世界，禮拜、親近、供養釋迦牟尼佛，及見文殊師利法王子菩薩、藥王菩薩、勇施菩薩、宿王華菩薩、上行意菩薩、莊嚴王菩薩、藥上菩薩。」
translation: I will go to the Śākyamuni world, venerate, get close to, and make offerings to Śākyamuni Buddha, and meet Mañjuśrī, the Dharma Prince Bodhisattva, the Medicine King Bodhisattva, the Courageous Giving Bodhisattva, the Constellation King Flower Bodhisattva, the Superior Acting Mind Bodhisattva, the Adorned King Bodhisattva, and the Superior Medicine Bodhisattva."

source_sentence: 爾時淨華宿王智佛告妙音菩薩：「汝莫輕彼國，生下劣想。
translation: It was then that the Pure Flower King of Constellations Buddha of Wisdom addressed the Bodhisattva Miaoyin, "Don't despise that country and give rise to inferior notions.

source_sentence: 善男子！
translation: Good sons!

source_sentence: 彼娑婆世界，高下不平，土石諸山，穢惡充滿，佛身卑小，諸菩薩眾其形亦小。
translation: In that sahā world, its heights are uneven, its mountains of dirt and rocks are filled with filth, and the body of the Buddha is small, and so are the forms of the bodhisattvas.

source_sentence: 而汝身四萬二千由旬，我身六百八十萬由旬，汝身第一端正，百千萬福，光明殊妙，是故汝往、莫輕彼國——若佛、菩薩及國土，生下劣想。」
translation: Since your body is 42,000 leagues long and mine is 6,800,000 leagues long, yours is the most correct body, with a hundred million merits and a marvelous radiance, so don't despise that country - if buddhas, bodhisattvas, and lands - and give rise to inferior notions."

source_sentence: 妙音菩薩白其佛言：「世尊！
translation: The Marvelous Sound Bodhisattva said to the Buddha, "Bhagavān!

source_sentence: 我今詣娑婆世界，皆是如來之力，如來神通遊戲，如來功德智慧莊嚴。」
translation: My present visit to the Śāmba world is due to the power of the Tathāgata, the play of his supernormal powers, and the adornment of his merits and wisdom."

source_sentence: 於是妙音菩薩不起于座，身不動搖，而入三昧，以三昧力，於耆闍崛山，去法座不遠，化作八萬四千眾寶蓮華，閻浮檀金為莖，白銀為葉，金剛為鬚，甄叔迦寶以為其臺。
translation: Then, without rising from his seat or bud, the Bodhisattva Miaoyin entered samādhi, and with the power of samādhi, he transformed himself on Mount Gṛdhrakūṭa, not far from his Dharma throne, into 84,000 lotus flowers of various jewels, with gold stalks made of jambūṭa, silver leaves, adamantine beards, and jewels of janshuka as their pedestals.

source_sentence: 爾時，文殊師利法王子見是蓮華，而白佛言：「世尊！
translation: Seeing these lotus flowers, the Dharma Prince Mañjuśrī said to the Buddha, "Bhagavān!

source_sentence: 是何因緣，先現此瑞？
translation: What were the causes and conditions that led to this auspicious appearance in the first place?

source_sentence: 有若干千萬蓮華，閻浮檀金為莖，白銀為葉，金剛為鬚，甄叔迦寶以為其臺。」
translation: There are tens of millions of lotus flowers with gold stalks made of jambu trees, silver leaves, vajra beards, and jewels made of janshuka for their pedestals."

source_sentence: 爾時釋迦牟尼佛告文殊師利：「是妙音菩薩摩訶薩，欲從淨華宿王智佛國，與八萬四千菩薩，圍繞而來至此娑婆世界，供養、親近、禮拜於我，亦欲供養、聽法華經。」
translation: It was then that Śākyamuni addressed Mañjuśrī, "This is the Sumati Bodhisattva Mahāsattva who wants to come from the Pure Flower Constellation King of Wisdom Buddha Land with 84,000 bodhisattvas surrounding him to this Saha World to make offerings to, be close to, and venerate me, and to make offerings to and listen to the Lotus Sutra."

source_sentence: 文殊師利白佛言：「世尊！
translation: Mañjuśrī said to the Buddha, "Bhagavān!

source_sentence: 是菩薩種何善本？
translation: What kind of good roots does this bodhisattva have?

source_sentence: 修何功德？
translation: What virtues does one cultivate?

source_sentence: 而能有是大神通力？
translation: And can there be great supernatural powers?

source_sentence: 行何三昧？
translation: What kind of samādhi does one practice?

source_sentence: 願為我等說是三昧名字，我等亦欲勤修行之，行此三昧，乃能見是菩薩色相大小，威儀進止。
translation: Please explain the name of this concentration for us, and we also want to diligently practice it so that we can see this bodhisattva's appearance, size, and deportment when we practice this concentration.

source_sentence: 唯願世尊以神通力，彼菩薩來，令我得見。」
translation: Please let the Bhagavān use his supernormal powers to allow us to see that bodhisattva when he comes."

source_sentence: 爾時釋迦牟尼佛告文殊師利：「此久滅度多寶如來，當為汝等而現其相。」
translation: It was then that Śākyamuni addressed Mañjuśrī, "This long-extinct Tathāgata of Many Treasures will show his form for you."

source_sentence: 時多寶佛告彼菩薩：「善男子！
translation: The Tathāgata Buddha then addressed the bodhisattva, "Good sons!

source_sentence: 來，文殊師利法王子欲見汝身。」
translation: Come, Mañjuśrī, Prince of the Dharma, who wants to see you in person."

source_sentence: 于時妙音菩薩於彼國沒，與八萬四千菩薩俱共發來。
translation: At the time, the Sumati-dārikā bodhisattva had gone into that country and come together with 84,000 other bodhisattvas.

source_sentence: 所經諸國，六種震動，皆悉雨於七寶蓮華；百千天樂，不鼓自鳴。
translation: In all the countries they passed through, six kinds of trembling rained down seven-jeweled lotus flowers, and a hundred thousand celestial musicians sounded without drumming.

source_sentence: 是菩薩目如廣大青蓮華葉，正使和合百千萬月，其面貌端正復過於此，身真金色，無量百千功德莊嚴，威德熾盛，光明照曜，諸相具足，如那羅延堅固之身。
translation: That bodhisattva's eyes are like the vast blue lotus leaves that correctly combine a million moons, and his features are even more correct than that, his body is truly golden, adorned with measureless hundreds of thousands of virtues, his authority is blazing, his light shines, and his features are complete, like the sturdy body of Nārāyaṇa.

source_sentence: 入七寶臺，上昇虛空，去地七多羅樹，諸菩薩眾恭敬圍繞，而來詣此娑婆世界耆闍崛山。
translation: He enters the seven-jeweled dais, ascends into the sky, goes down to the ground to seven talas, is surrounded by a multitude of bodhisattvas, and arrives at Mount Gṛdhrakūṭa in the Saṃbha world with respect and dignity.

source_sentence: 到已，下七寶臺，以價直百千瓔珞，持至釋迦牟尼佛所，頭面禮足，奉上瓔珞，而白佛言：「世尊！
translation: When he arrived, he descended from the seven-jeweled dais, took a hundred thousand ornaments of value and carried them to Śākyamuni Buddha, bowed his head and feet, presented them to him, and said to him, "Bhagavān!

source_sentence: 淨華宿王智佛問訊世尊，少病、少惱，起居輕利，安樂行不？
translation: Would the Bhagavān, the pure flower king of constellations and wise buddhas, ask him about the practice of few illnesses and few disturbances, the ease of rising and standing, and comfort?

source_sentence: 四大調和不？
translation: Four major blends and no?

source_sentence: 世事可忍不？
translation: Are the things of the world tolerable?

source_sentence: 眾生易度不？
translation: Are the multitude of beings easy to cross over?

source_sentence: 無多貪欲、瞋恚、愚癡、嫉妬、慳慢不？
translation: Are there not many desires, anger, delusions, jealousies, and stinginess?

source_sentence: 無不孝父母、不敬沙門、邪見、不善心、不攝五情不？
translation: Are there no unfilial parents, no irreverent ascetics, wrong views, unwholesome thoughts, or failure to include the five emotions?

source_sentence: 世尊！
translation: Bhagavān!

source_sentence: 眾生能降伏諸魔怨不？
translation: Can sentient beings subdue Māra's enemies?

source_sentence: 久滅度多寶如來在七寶塔中，來聽法不？
translation: Did the long-extinct Tathāgata Abundant Treasures Tathāgata come to listen to the teaching in one of the seven-jeweled stūpas?

source_sentence: 又問訊多寶如來，安隱、少惱，堪忍久住不？
translation: Again, I'd like to know if the Tathāgata Abundant Treasures Tathāgata is peaceful, has few disturbances, and can tolerate long abiding.

source_sentence: 世尊！
translation: Bhagavān!

source_sentence: 我今欲見多寶佛身，唯願世尊，示我令見。」
translation: Now, I want to see the body of the Prabhūtaratna Buddha, so may the Bhagavān show me how to see it."

source_sentence: 爾時釋迦牟尼佛語多寶佛：「是妙音菩薩欲得相見。」
translation: It was then that Śākyamuni Buddha said to Prabhūtaratna Buddha, "This is the bodhisattva Miaoyin who wants to see each other."

source_sentence: 時多寶佛告妙音言：「善哉，善哉！
translation: The then Prabhūtaratna Buddha addressed Miaoyin, saying, "Good, good!

source_sentence: 汝能為供養釋迦牟尼佛及聽法華經，并見文殊師利等，故來至此。」
translation: Can you make offerings to Śākyamuni Buddha, listen to the Lotus Sutra, and see Mañjuśrī and others, and so come here?"

source_sentence: 爾時華德菩薩白佛言：「世尊！
translation: It was then that the Blessed One said to the Buddha, "Bhagavān!

source_sentence: 是妙音菩薩，種何善根，修何功德，有是神力？」
translation: What good roots did this Marvelous Sound Bodhisattva plant and what virtues did he cultivate that gave him such supernormal powers?"

source_sentence: 佛告華德菩薩：「過去有佛，名雲雷音王多陀阿伽度、阿羅訶、三藐三佛陀，國名現一切世間，劫名憙見，妙音菩薩於萬二千歲，以十萬種伎樂供養雲雷音王佛，并奉上八萬四千七寶鉢。
translation: The Buddha told Padmaśrī, "In the past, there was a Buddha named Megha-dundubhi-mega-nirghoṣa-samyak-saṃbuddha whose kingdom name appeared in all the world and whose eon name was Jogyesa, and Miaoyin Bodhisattva offered Megha-dundubhi-mega-nirghoṣa-saṃbha with 100,000 kinds of music and 84,000 seven-jewel bowls for 12,000 years.

source_sentence: 以是因緣果報，今生淨華宿王智佛國，有是神力。
translation: As a result of these causes and conditions, he was born in the Jñānagupta Constellation King Zhizo Buddha Land and had this miraculous power.

source_sentence: 華德！
translation: Padmaśrī!

source_sentence: 於汝意云何？
translation: What do you think?

source_sentence: 爾時雲雷音王佛所，妙音菩薩——伎樂供養、奉上寶器者，豈異人乎？
translation: At the time, at the residence of Megha-dundubhi-mega-voice bodhisattva, was that someone else who made musical offerings and presented him with a jeweled vessel?

source_sentence: 今此妙音菩薩摩訶薩是。
translation: "Now, this is the Marvelous Sound Bodhisattva Mahāsattva.

source_sentence: 華德！
translation: Padmaśrī!

source_sentence: 是妙音菩薩，已曾供養親近無量諸佛，久殖德本，又值恒河沙等百千萬億那由他佛。
translation: This is the Marvelous Sound Bodhisattva, who has made offerings to and become intimate with measureless buddhas, has long cultivated a base of virtue, and has attained a hundred thousand million nayutas like the Ganges River Sands.

source_sentence: 「華德！
translation: "Padma-mātṛ!

source_sentence: 汝但見妙音菩薩其身在此，而是菩薩，現種種身，處處為諸眾生說是經典——或現梵王身，或現帝釋身，或現自在天身，或現大自在天身，或現天大將軍身，或現毘沙門天王身，或現轉輪聖王身，或現諸小王身，或現長者身，或現居士身，或現宰官身，或現婆羅門身，或現比丘、比丘尼、優婆塞、優婆夷身，或現長者居士婦女身，或現宰官婦女身，或現婆羅門婦女身，或現童男、童女身，或現天、龍、夜叉、乾闥婆、阿修羅、迦樓羅、緊那羅、摩睺羅伽、人非人等身，而說是經。
translation: 汝但見妙音菩薩其身在此，而是菩薩，現種種身，處處為諸眾生說是經典——或現梵王身，或現帝釋身，或現自在天身，或現大自在天身，或現天大將軍身，或現毘沙門天王身，或現轉輪聖王身，或現諸小王身，或現長者身，或現居士身，或現宰官身，或現婆羅門身，或現比丘、比丘尼、優婆塞、優婆夷身，或現長者居士婦女身，或現宰官婦女身，或現婆羅門婦女身，或現童男、童女身，或現天、龍、夜叉、乾闥婆、阿修羅、迦樓羅、緊那羅、摩睺羅伽、人非人等身，而說是經。

source_sentence: 諸有地獄、餓鬼、畜生，及眾難處，皆能救濟，乃至於王後宮，變為女身，而說是經。
translation: He's able to rescue all the hells, hungry ghosts, animals, and other difficult places, even to the point where he transforms into the body of a woman in the king's harem and speaks this sūtra.

source_sentence: 「華德！
translation: "Blessed be the virtuous one!

source_sentence: 是妙音菩薩，能救護娑婆世界諸眾生者，是妙音菩薩如是種種變化現身，在此娑婆國土，為諸眾生說是經典，於神通、變化、智慧無所損減。
translation: "This is the Marvelous Sound Bodhisattva who can rescue the sentient beings of the Saha world because this is the Marvelous Sound Bodhisattva who, in this Saha land, explains these sūtras to sentient beings in various transformation bodies, without any loss of superknowledge, transformation, or wisdom.

source_sentence: 是菩薩，以若干智慧明照娑婆世界，令一切眾生各得所知；於十方恒河沙世界中，亦復如是。
translation: That bodhisattva clearly illuminates the sahā world with certain kinds of wisdom, so that all sentient beings can each know it; it's likewise in the world of the Ganges River Sands in the ten directions.

source_sentence: 若應以聲聞形得度者，現聲聞形而為說法；應以辟支佛形得度者，現辟支佛形而為說法；應以菩薩形得度者，現菩薩形而為說法；應以佛形得度者，即現佛形而為說法。
translation: If someone should be saved in the form of a śrāvaka, they will appear in the form of a śrāvaka and preach; if someone should be saved in the form of a pratyekabuddha, they will appear in the form of a pratyekabuddha and preach; if someone should be saved in the form of a bodhisattva, they will appear in the form of a bodhisattva and preach; and if someone should be saved in the form of a buddha, they will appear in the form of a buddha and preach.

source_sentence: 如是種種，隨所應度而為現形，乃至應以滅度而得度者，示現滅度。
translation: These are the kinds of things that are manifested in the form of the person who should be saved, up to the point where the person should be saved by being saved by being saved from extinction, and then they show themselves as being saved from extinction.

source_sentence: 「華德！
translation: "Padma-mātṛ!

source_sentence: 妙音菩薩摩訶薩，成就大神通智慧之力，其事如是。」
translation: Miaoyin Pusa Mahāsāda has accomplished the power of great supernormal wisdom, and this is how it happened."

source_sentence: 爾時華德菩薩白佛言：「世尊！
translation: It was then that the Bodhisattva Flower Power said to the Buddha, "Bhagavān!

source_sentence: 是妙音菩薩，深種善根。
translation: This is the Marvelous Sound Bodhisattva, who has deeply planted good roots.

source_sentence: 世尊！
translation: Bhagavān!

source_sentence: 是菩薩住何三昧，而能如是在所變現，度脫眾生？」
translation: What kind of samādhi does the bodhisattva abide in that enables him to thus manifest himself in and liberate sentient beings?"

source_sentence: 佛告華德菩薩：「善男子！
translation: The Buddha addressed the bodhisattva Flower Power, "Good sons!

source_sentence: 其三昧名現一切色身，妙音菩薩住是三昧中，能如是饒益無量眾生。」
translation: That samādhi is called the manifestation of all forms of body, and Miaoyin Bodhisattva abides in that samādhi and can thus benefit measureless sentient beings."

source_sentence: 說是妙音菩薩品時，與妙音菩薩俱來者八萬四千人，皆得現一切色身三昧；此娑婆世界無量菩薩，亦得是三昧及陀羅尼。
translation: When this chapter of the Chapter of Miao-yin Bodhisattva was taught, 84,000 people who came with Miao-yin Bodhisattva attained the samādhi of manifesting all forms of body, and measureless bodhisattvas in this sahā world also attained this samādhi and dhāraṇī.

source_sentence: 爾時妙音菩薩摩訶薩供養釋迦牟尼佛及多寶佛塔已，還歸本土，所經諸國，六種震動，雨寶蓮華，作百千萬億種種伎樂。
translation: After making offerings to Śākyamuni Buddha and the many-jeweled stūpa, the Sumeru Bodhisattva returned to his homeland, where he passed through various countries that were shaken by six kinds of things, rained down jeweled lotus flowers, and created a hundred thousand million million kinds of music.

source_sentence: 既到本國，與八萬四千菩薩、圍繞至淨華宿王智佛所，白佛言：「世尊！
translation: When he arrived in his native land, he was surrounded by 84,000 bodhisattvas who went to the Jñānagupta Constellation King Zhizhao and said to the Buddha, "Bhagavān!

source_sentence: 我到娑婆世界饒益眾生，見釋迦牟尼佛，及見多寶佛塔，禮拜、供養；又見文殊師利法王子菩薩，及見藥王菩薩、得勤精進力菩薩、勇施菩薩等，亦令是八萬四千菩薩得現一切色身三昧。
translation: When I went to the Saha world to benefit sentient beings, I saw Śākyamuni Buddha, saw many jeweled Buddha stūpas, venerated and made offerings to them, saw Mañjuśrī, the Dharma Prince Bodhisattva, saw the Medicine King Bodhisattva, attained the power of diligence, the Bodhisattva of Courageous Giving, and so forth, and caused 84,000 of these bodhisattvas to attain the samādhi of manifesting all forms of body.

source_sentence: 說是妙音菩薩來往品時，四萬二千天子得無生法忍，華德菩薩得法華三昧。」
translation: When this was said to be the stage of the coming and going of the Bodhisattva Miao-yin, 42,000 celestials attained the patient acceptance of the nonarising of the Dharma, and the Bodhisattva of Flower Power attained the samādhi of the Lotus."

source_sentence: 御製觀世音普門品經序
translation: Preface to the Avalokitêśvara Universal Gate Chapter Sutra

source_sentence: 觀世音菩薩，以爍迦羅心應變無窮，自在神通遍遊法界，入微塵國土說法濟度，具足妙相弘誓如海，凡有因緣發清淨心，纔舉聲稱，即隨聲而應，所有欲願即獲如意。
translation: Avalokitêśvara Bodhisattva, whose mind is endlessly varied because of his scintillating kalaviṅka, whose unimpeded supernormal powers roam the Dharma realm, who enters the subtlest lands to preach the Dharma and save them, whose marvelous attributes are complete, whose vast vow is like an ocean, and whose pure mind arouses causes and conditions when he raises his voice to proclaim, is answered according to that voice, and whose desires and wishes are fulfilled as intended.

source_sentence: 妙法蓮華經普門品者，為度脫苦惱之真詮也。
translation: This is the Samanta-mukha-parivarto of the Lotus Sutra, which is a true explanation of how to liberate people from suffering and distress.

source_sentence: 人能常以是經作觀，一念方萌，即見大悲勝相，能滅一切諸苦，其功德不可思議。
translation: When a person can always contemplate this sūtra, a single thought will only sprout, and he'll see the overpowering characteristic of great compassion that can end all suffering, and its merit is unfathomable.

source_sentence: 朕惟天道福善禍淫，故佛示果報，使人為善而不敢為惡。
translation: We only know that the path of heaven is blessed with goodness and evil, so the Buddha shows the results so that people will do good and not dare to do evil.

source_sentence: 夫天堂、地獄皆由人為，不違於方寸之內，故為善者得升天堂，為惡者即墮地獄。
translation: Heaven and hell are all created by humans and don't fall within a square inch, so those who are good will rise to heaven, and those who are evil will fall to hell.

source_sentence: 夫忠臣孝子吉人貞士，其心即佛，故神明芘佑，業障俱泯，是以生不犯於憲條，沒不墮於無間。
translation: Because loyal subjects, filial sons, and good men and noble men are buddhas in their minds, the gods bless them and extinguish all karmic hindrances, so they aren't born in violation of the constitution and don't fall into the unremitting hells when they perish.

source_sentence: 夫兇頑之徒，一於為惡，棄五倫如敝帚，蹈刑法如飲甘，寧餧羅剎，不欽佛道。
translation: A recalcitrant person who is devoted to evil discards the five ethics like a shameful broom, resorts to criminal law like drinking sugar, and would rather feed on a Rāṣṭrapāla than admire the Buddha's way.

source_sentence: 然人性本善，所為惡者，特氣質之偏；苟能改心易慮，修省避畏，轉移之間惡可為善矣。
translation: However, human nature is inherently good, and what's evil is simply the bias of their temperament; if they can change their minds and change their thoughts, cultivate introspection, and avoid fear, the evil in between will become good.

source_sentence: 為善則即善人，昔之所積之咎，如太空點塵、紅罏片雪，消滌淨盡，雖有果報將安施乎？
translation: If you can change your mind and change your thinking, cultivate discipline, and avoid fear, then you can turn away evil and become good.

source_sentence: 朕恒念此，惟恐世之人有過而不知改，乃甘心焉以自棄，遂表章是經，使善良君子永堅禁戒之心，廣納無量之福，為善功德豈有涯涘哉！
translation: I am constantly mindful of this, lest people in the world who have faults and do not know how to change them become resigned to abandoning themselves, and so I have codified this sūtra so that good men will always hold fast to the mind of moral discipline and widely accept immeasurable merit; how could there be a limit to the merit of doing good?

translation: Miaofa lianhua jing guanshiyin pusa pumen pin xxv At that point, the bodhisattva Muyiqieyi rose from his seat, bared his right shoulder, folded his palms, and addressed the Buddha, saying, "Bhagavān!

source_sentence: 觀世音菩薩，以何因緣名觀世音？」
translation: Avalokitêśvara Bodhisattva, by what causes and conditions is he called Avalokitêśvara?"

source_sentence: 佛告無盡意菩薩：「善男子！
translation: The Buddha addressed the bodhisattva Akṣayamati, "Good sons!

source_sentence: 若有無量百千萬億眾生受諸苦惱，聞是觀世音菩薩，一心稱名，觀世音菩薩即時觀其音聲，皆得解脫。
translation: "If there are measureless hundreds of thousands of millions of sentient beings who are suffering and afflicted, and they hear this Avalokitêśvara Bodhisattva and whole-heartedly call on his name, the Avalokitêśvara Bodhisattva immediately observes his voice and they are all liberated.

source_sentence: 若有持是觀世音菩薩名者，設入大火，火不能燒，由是菩薩威神力故。
translation: If someone holding this Avalokitêśvara Bodhisattva's name were to enter a great fire, it wouldn't burn them because of the bodhisattva's authority and power.

source_sentence: 若為大水所漂，稱其名號，即得淺處。
translation: If they're caught in a great river and call on its name, they'll find a shallow place.

source_sentence: 若有百千萬億眾生，為求金、銀、琉璃、車璩、馬瑙、珊瑚、虎珀、真珠等寶，入於大海，假使黑風吹其船舫，飄墮羅剎鬼國，其中若有，乃至一人，稱觀世音菩薩名者，是諸人等皆得解脫羅剎之難。
translation: If a hundred thousand million million sentient beings seeking gold, silver, lapis lazuli, carabiners, coral, tiger pearls, real pearls, or other treasures enter the ocean and suppose a black wind blows their boats and they're swept away into a Rājagṛha ghost land, then if there's one of them, or even one person, who calls on the name of Avalokitêśvara Bodhisattva, those people will be liberated from the difficulty of Rājagṛha.

source_sentence: 以是因緣，名觀世音。
translation: Because of this, they're called Avalokitêśvara.

source_sentence: 若復有人臨當被害，稱觀世音菩薩名者，彼所執刀杖尋段段壞，而得解脫。
translation: If another person is about to be harmed and they call on the name of Avalokitêśvara, the knife or staff they're holding will be destroyed piece by piece, and they'll be liberated.

source_sentence: 若三千大千國土，滿中夜叉、羅剎，欲來惱人，聞其稱觀世音菩薩名者，是諸惡鬼，尚不能以惡眼視之，況復加害。
translation: If 3,000 great thousand lands are filled with yakṣas and rāṣas who want to come and harm people, and they hear them calling Avalokitêśvara Bodhisattva by name, those evil spirits won't be able to look at them with their evil eyes, so how could they harm them?

source_sentence: 設復有人，若有罪、若無罪，杻械、枷鎖檢繫其身，稱觀世音菩薩名者，皆悉斷壞，即得解脫。
translation: Suppose there's a person who's guilty or not guilty and whose body is tied up with an armor or shackles and who calls on the name of Avalokitêśvara Bodhisattva, they'll all be destroyed and immediately liberated.

source_sentence: 若三千大千國土，滿中怨賊，有一商主，將諸商人，齎持重寶、經過嶮路，其中一人作是唱言：『諸善男子！
translation: Suppose there's a merchant in one of the 3,000 great thousand lands filled with enemies and thieves, and there's a merchant carrying valuable treasures and passing through a dangerous path, and one of them calls out, 'Good sons!

source_sentence: 勿得恐怖，汝等應當一心稱觀世音菩薩名號。
translation: Don't be afraid; you must all wholeheartedly call on the name of Avalokitêśvara Bodhisattva.

source_sentence: 是菩薩能以無畏施於眾生，汝等若稱名者，於此怨賊當得解脫。』
translation: This is a bodhisattva who can bestow fearlessness on sentient beings, and if you call him by that name, you'll be freed from this enemy.'

source_sentence: 眾商人聞，俱發聲言：『南無觀世音菩薩。』
translation: When the merchants heard this, they all spoke up and said, 'Homage to Avalokitêśvara Bodhisattva.'

source_sentence: 稱其名故，即得解脫。
translation: By calling him by his name, they'll be liberated.

source_sentence: 「無盡意！
translation: "Inexhaustible!

source_sentence: 觀世音菩薩摩訶薩，威神之力巍巍如是。
translation: Avalokitêśvara Bodhisattva Mahāsattva's authoritative power is as lofty as this.

source_sentence: 若有眾生多於婬欲，常念恭敬觀世音菩薩，便得離欲。
translation: If sentient beings have many sexual desires, they can become free of desire when they always remember and revere Avalokitêśvara Bodhisattva.

source_sentence: 若多瞋恚，常念恭敬觀世音菩薩，便得離瞋。
translation: If they have a lot of anger, they'll always be mindful and respectful of Avalokitêśvara Bodhisattva, and then they'll be freed from anger.

source_sentence: 若多愚癡，常念恭敬觀世音菩薩，便得離癡。
translation: If they are often foolish, they'll always be mindful and respectful of Avalokitêśvara Bodhisattva, and then they'll be free of delusion.

source_sentence: 「無盡意！
translation: "Inexhaustible thought!

source_sentence: 觀世音菩薩有如是等大威神力，多所饒益，是故眾生常應心念。
translation: Avalokitêśvara Bodhisattva has such great authority and supernormal powers that are often beneficial, so sentient beings should always be mindful of that.

source_sentence: 若有女人，設欲求男，禮拜供養觀世音菩薩，便生福德智慧之男；設欲求女，便生端正有相之女。
translation: If a woman wants to meet a man, she'll venerate and make offerings to Avalokitêśvara Bodhisattva, and a man of virtue and wisdom will be born, and if she wants to meet a woman, a woman of dignity and features will be born.

source_sentence: 宿殖德本，眾人愛敬。
translation: They have a long history of virtue, and they're loved and respected by many people.

translation: Avalokitêśvara Bodhisattva has such power that if sentient beings respectfully venerate Avalokitêśvara Bodhisattva, their merits won't be overwhelming; therefore, all sentient beings should accept and uphold the name of Avalokitêśvara Bodhisattva.

source_sentence: 「無盡意！

source_sentence: 若有人受持六十二億恒河沙菩薩名字，復盡形供養飲食、衣服、臥具、醫藥。
translation: "Suppose someone accepts the name of the 6,200,000,000,000 Gaṅgāsas bodhisattva and also makes all physical offerings of food, drink, clothing, bedding, and medicine.

source_sentence: 於汝意云何？

translation: Inexhaustible thought said, "Very much, Bhagavān!"

source_sentence: 佛言：「若復有人受持觀世音菩薩名號，乃至一時禮拜、供養，是二人福，正等無異，於百千萬億劫不可窮盡。
translation: The Buddha said, "If another person accepts the name of Avalokitêśvara Bodhisattva, even if they worship and make offerings to him at one time, those two people's merits will be exactly the same, without distinction, and they can't be exhausted over a hundred thousand million eons.

source_sentence: 無盡意！

source_sentence: 受持觀世音菩薩名號，得如是無量無邊福德之利。」
translation: By upholding the name of Avalokitêśvara Bodhisattva, you'll attain such immeasurable and limitless benefits of merit."

translation: Having achieved such virtue, Avalokitêśvara Bodhisattva travels around the lands in various forms to liberate sentient beings.

source_sentence: 是故汝等，應當一心供養觀世音菩薩。
translation: Therefore, you people should wholeheartedly make offerings to Avalokitêśvara Bodhisattva.

translation: This Avalokitêśvara Bodhisattva Mahāsattva is able to bestow fearlessness in the midst of fear and difficulty, and so everyone in the sahā world is called "one who bestows fearlessness."

translation: For our sakes, accept this necklace."

source_sentence: 爾時佛告觀世音菩薩：「當愍此無盡意菩薩及四眾，天、龍、夜叉、乾闥婆、阿修羅、迦樓羅、緊那羅、摩睺羅伽、人非人等故，受是瓔珞。」
translation: It was then that the Buddha addressed Avalokitêśvara Bodhisattva, "Please take pity on this inexhaustible-minded bodhisattva and the four crowds of gods, dragons, yakṣas, gandharvas, asuras, garuḍas, kiṃnaras, mahoragas, humans and non-humans, and so forth, and accept this necklace."

source_sentence: 即時觀世音菩薩愍諸四眾，及於天、龍、人非人等，受其瓔珞，分作二分，一分奉釋迦牟尼佛，一分奉多寶佛塔。
translation: Immediately, the Avalokitêśvara Bodhisattva took pity on the four crowds, gods, dragons, humans, and non-humans alike, and accepted their necklaces, dividing them into two parts, one for Śakyamuni Buddha and one for the Prabhūtaratna.

source_sentence: 「無盡意，觀世音菩薩有如是自在神力，遊於娑婆世界。」
translation: "With this kind of unimpeded spiritual power, the Avalokitêśvara Bodhisattva travels around the Śākya World."

source_sentence: 爾時無盡意菩薩以偈問曰：「世尊妙相具，　　我今重問彼，　佛子何因緣，　　名為觀世音？
translation: At the time, the Bodhisattva of inexhaustible intent asked in verse, "The Bhagavān has marvelous features, and now I'm asking him again, 'What is the reason the Buddha is called Avalokitêśvara?'

source_sentence: 具足妙相尊，　　偈答無盡意：『汝聽觀音行，　　善應諸方所，　弘誓深如海，　　歷劫不思議，　侍多千億佛，　　發大清淨願。
translation: "Venerable Prabhūtaratna, the verse answers inexhaustible questions, 'You've heard Avalokitêśvara's practice, which well responds to all directions, has a profound vow as deep as the ocean, passes through eons without discursive thought, serves a hundred billion buddhas, and makes a great pure vow.

source_sentence: 我為汝略說，　　聞名及見身，　心念不空過，　　能滅諸有苦。
translation: I'll explain it briefly for you, hearing the name and seeing the body, mindful and not in vain, will end the suffering of all sentient beings.

source_sentence: 假使興害意，　　推落大火坑，　念彼觀音力，　　火坑變成池。
translation: Suppose you were to have harmful thoughts and fall into a great fiery pit, and you were to remember the power of Avalokitêśvara, and that fiery pit becomes a pond.

source_sentence: 或漂流巨海，　　龍魚諸鬼難，　念彼觀音力，　　波浪不能沒。
translation: Suppose he drifts into a huge ocean and is confronted by dragons, fish, and ghosts, and he's mindful of Avalokitêśvara's power, the waves can't sink him.

source_sentence: 或在須彌峯，　　為人所推墮，　念彼觀音力，　　如日虛空住。
translation: Sometimes they're on Sumeru Peak and are pushed down by someone, but they remember the power of Avalokitêśvara and stay like the sun in space.

source_sentence: 或被惡人逐，　　墮落金剛山，　念彼觀音力，　　不能損一毛。
translation: Sometimes they're chased by evil people and fall down Vajra Mountain, but mindful of Avalokitêśvara's power, they can't lose a hair.

source_sentence: 或值怨賊繞，　　各執刀加害，　念彼觀音力，　　咸即起慈心。
translation: Sometimes they're surrounded by enemies and thieves, each holding a sword and inflicting harm, and they remember the power of Avalokitêśvara and immediately become compassionate.

source_sentence: 或遭王難苦，　　臨刑欲壽終，　念彼觀音力，　　刀尋段段壞。
translation: Sometimes a king suffers hardship and is about to die, but when he remembers the power of Avalokitêśvara, his sword finds its way into pieces and destroys them.

source_sentence: 或囚禁枷鎖，　　手足被杻械，　念彼觀音力，　　釋然得解脫。
translation: They may be imprisoned and chained, or their hands and feet may be handcuffed, but when they remember the power of Avalokitêśvara, they're freed completely.

source_sentence: 呪詛諸毒藥，　　所欲害身者，　念彼觀音力，　　還著於本人。
translation: A spell is cast on those who are cursed with poison and want to harm themselves, but they'll return to themselves by remembering the power of Avalokitêśvara.

source_sentence: 或遇惡羅剎、　　毒龍諸鬼等，　念彼觀音力，　　時悉不敢害。
translation: When they encounter harmful rājasas or poisonous dragons and other spirits, they won't dare to harm them if they remember the power of Avalokitêśvara.

source_sentence: 若惡獸圍遶，　　利牙爪可怖，　念彼觀音力，　　疾走無邊方。
translation: If they're surrounded by dangerous animals with sharp teeth and fearful claws, mindful of their Avalokitêśvara power, they quickly run off in measureless directions.

source_sentence: 蚖蛇及蝮蠍，　　氣毒煙火燃，　念彼觀音力，　　尋聲自迴去。
translation: When snakes and vipers, venomous smoke and fires ignite, mindful of the power of Avalokitêśvara, they turn away on their own when they hear the sound.

source_sentence: 雲雷鼓掣電，　　降雹澍大雨，　念彼觀音力，　　應時得消散。
translation: When clouds thunder and drums flash lightning, and hail and rain fall, mindful of Avalokitêśvara's power, they are dispersed on cue.

source_sentence: 眾生被困厄，　　無量苦逼身，　觀音妙智力，　　能救世間苦。
translation: When sentient beings are beset by trouble and limitless suffering, Avalokitêśvara's marvelous power of discernment can save them from worldly suffering.

source_sentence: 具足神通力，　　廣修智方便，　十方諸國土，　　無剎不現身。
translation: Possessing supernormal powers and extensively cultivating the arts of wisdom, there are no lands in the ten directions where Avalokitêśvara doesn't manifest himself.

source_sentence: 種種諸惡趣，　　地獄鬼畜生，　生老病死苦，　　以漸悉令滅。
translation: The various evil destinies, hell, ghosts, and animals, and the suffering of birth, old age, illness, and death are all gradually extinguished.

source_sentence: 真觀清淨觀，　　廣大智慧觀，　悲觀及慈觀，　　常願常瞻仰。
translation: He observes the purity of true contemplation, the breadth of wisdom, and the contemplation of pity and kindness, always venerating them with the hope that they'll always be venerated.

source_sentence: 無垢清淨光，　　慧日破諸闇，　能伏災風火，　　普明照世間。
translation: The pure, unblemished light of wisdom that shatters darkness, quells calamity, winds, and fires, and illuminates the world universally.

source_sentence: 悲體戒雷震，　　慈意妙大雲，　澍甘露法雨，　　滅除煩惱焰。
translation: The essence of compassion and morality thunder, and the mind of kindness is a great, marvelous cloud that rains down sweet dharma and extinguishes the flames of affliction.

source_sentence: 諍訟經官處，　　怖畏軍陣中，　念彼觀音力，　　眾怨悉退散。
translation: In the midst of disputes, quarrels, and fearful armies, mindful of Avalokitêśvara's power, all enemies are dispersed.

source_sentence: 妙音觀世音，　　梵音海潮音，　勝彼世間音，　　是故須常念，　念念勿生疑。
translation: Avalokitêśvara, the marvelous sound, and the Brahmā ocean-tide sound are superior to those worldly sounds; therefore, you must always remember them and never become doubtful in each moment.

source_sentence: 觀世音淨聖，　於苦惱死厄，　　能為作依怙，　具一切功德，　　慈眼視眾生，　福聚海無量，　　是故應頂禮。』」
translation: Avalokitêśvara is pure and noble, a reliable support in the face of suffering, distress, and death, endowed with all merits, a compassionate eye that sees sentient beings, and an ocean of merit that's measureless; therefore, you should bow to him.'"

source_sentence: 爾時持地菩薩即從座起，前白佛言：「世尊！
translation: It was then that the Earth-holding Bodhisattva rose from his seat and went up to the Buddha, saying, "Bhagavān!

source_sentence: 若有眾生，聞是觀世音菩薩品自在之業，普門示現神通力者，當知是人功德不少。」
translation: If there are sentient beings who hear this Avalokitêśvara Chapter of the Bodhisattva's unimpeded actions and this universal display of his supernormal powers, they should know that this person has quite a bit of merit."

source_sentence: 佛說是普門品時，眾中八萬四千眾生，皆發無等等阿耨多羅三藐三菩提心。
translation: When the Buddha spoke this Chapter of the Universal Gate, 84,000 sentient beings in the multitude aroused the unsurpassed mind of unsurpassed, correct, and complete enlightenment.

source_sentence: 若善男子、善女人，有能受持法華經者——若讀誦通利，若書寫經卷——得幾所福？」
translation: If good men and good women are able to memorize the Lotus Sutra-if they read and recite it thoroughly, and if they write the sūtras-what merit does it obtain?"

translation: What do you think?

source_sentence: 其所得福，寧為多不？」
translation: Would it be better to receive more merit than that?"

source_sentence: 「甚多，世尊。」
translation: "It's very substantial, Bhagavān."

source_sentence: 佛言：「若善男子、善女人，能於是經，乃至受持一四句偈，讀誦、解義、如說修行，功德甚多。」
translation: The Buddha said, "If good sons and good women can read this sūtra or even accept a four-line verse, recite it, understand its meaning, and practice it as it's spoken, their merit is very great."

translation: This is a supernatural dhāraṇī spell that has been taught by buddhas as vast as the Ganges River, and they all agree with it; if someone disparages this Dharma teacher, they will have disparaged these buddhas."

translation: I also explain this dhāraṇī for the sake of pity for sentient beings and to support this teacher of the Dharma."

translation: Because this divine spell protects the Dharma teacher, I myself will protect the bearer of this sūtra, so that there will be no misfortune within a hundred leagues."

translation: We also want to protect those who recite and memorize the Lotus Sutra and remove their troubles, and if anyone seeks to shorten the teacher of the Dharma, they won't be able to do so."

source_sentence: 犯此法師者，　　當獲如是殃。」
translation: Such is the misfortune that will befall someone who violates this teacher of the Dharma."

translation: After the rāṣṭrapāla women spoke this verse, they said to the Buddha, "Bhagavān!

source_sentence: 我等亦當身自擁護受持、讀誦、修行是經者，令得安隱，離諸衰患，消眾毒藥。」
translation: We will also personally support those of you who retain, recite, and practice this sūtra, so that you may attain peace, be free of troubles, and eliminate numerous poisons."

source_sentence: 佛告諸羅剎女：「善哉，善哉！
translation: The Buddha told the Rāṣṭrapāla women, "Good, good!

source_sentence: 汝等但能擁護受持法華名者，福不可量，何況擁護具足受持，供養經卷——華、香、瓔珞，末香、塗香、燒香，幡蓋、伎樂；燃種種燈：酥燈、油燈、諸香油燈、蘇摩那華油燈、瞻蔔華油燈、婆師迦華油燈、優鉢羅華油燈，如是等百千種供養者。
translation: It's incalculably meritorious for you simply to embrace and uphold the name of the Lotus, much less to embrace and uphold it fully, making offerings to the scrolls of the sutras - flowers, incense, jewelry, incense for incense, perfume, burning incense, banners, music, and the lighting of various lamps: ghee lamps, oil lamps, oil lamps with incense, oil lamps with the sumāna flower, oil lamps with the campaka flower, oil lamps with the vāsikā flower, oil lamps with the upāla flower, and so on - and a hundred thousand other kinds of offerings.

source_sentence: 睪帝！
translation: Testi!

source_sentence: 汝等及眷屬，應當擁護如是法師。」
translation: You and your retinue should embrace such a teacher of the Dharma."

source_sentence: 說是陀羅尼品時，六萬八千人、得無生法忍。
translation: When this chapter of the dhāraṇī was spoken, 68,000 people attained the patient acceptance of the nonarising of the Dharma.

source_sentence: 妙法蓮華經妙莊嚴王本事品第二十七爾時佛告諸大眾：「乃往古世，過無量無邊不可思議阿僧祇劫，有佛名雲雷音宿王華智多陀阿伽度、阿羅訶、三藐三佛陀，國名光明莊嚴，劫名憙見。
translation: It was then that the Buddha addressed the crowd, "In an ancient time, long ago, beyond measureless and limitless unfathomable incalculable eons, there was a Buddha named Meghasvaradhara, Araha, Samyak-saṃbuddha, whose kingdom was called Jogyeolgyeo, and whose eon was called Jogyeolgyeo.

source_sentence: 彼佛法中有王，名妙莊嚴，其王夫人名曰淨德，有二子，一名淨藏，二名淨眼。
translation: There's a king in that Buddha's Dharma named Sublime Adornment, whose wife is named Jingde and has two sons, one named Jingzang and the other named Jingye.

source_sentence: 是二子有大神力，福德智慧，久修菩薩所行之道，所謂檀波羅蜜、尸羅波羅蜜、羼提波羅蜜、毘梨耶波羅蜜、禪波羅蜜、般若波羅蜜、方便波羅蜜，慈悲喜捨，乃至三十七品助道法皆悉明了通達。
translation: These two sons have great psychic powers, merit, and wisdom, and have long cultivated the path practiced by the bodhisattvas, which is called the perfection of giving, the perfection of śīla, the perfection of kṣatriya, the perfection of vīrya, the perfection of meditation, the perfection of wisdom, the perfection of skillful means, the perfection of kindness, pity, joy, and equanimity, and even the thirty-seven factors that aid in the path.

source_sentence: 又得菩薩淨三昧、日星宿三昧、淨光三昧、淨色三昧、淨照明三昧、長莊嚴三昧、大威德藏三昧，於此三昧亦悉通達。
translation: He also attained the bodhisattva's pure concentration, sun and star constellation concentration, pure light concentration, pure form concentration, pure illumination concentration, long adornment concentration, and great authoritative store concentration, and he fully comprehended these samādhis.

source_sentence: 「爾時彼佛欲引導妙莊嚴王，及愍念眾生故，說是法華經。
translation: "It was then that the Buddha wanted to guide the king of marvelous adornment and to take pity on sentient beings, so he taught this Lotus Sutra.

source_sentence: 時淨藏、淨眼二子到其母所，合十指爪掌白言：『願母往詣雲雷音宿王華智佛所，我等亦當侍從，親近、供養、禮拜。
translation: When the two sons Jingsang and Jingshan went to their mother, they joined their palms with ten fingers and fingertips and said, 'May our mother go to the Flower Wisdom Buddha, the Sukhāvatī king of Thunderclaps, and we will also attend, become close to, make offerings to, and venerate him.'

source_sentence: 所以者何？
translation: Why is that?

source_sentence: 此佛於一切天人眾中說法華經，宜應聽受。』
translation: This Buddha teaches the Lotus Sutra among all gods and humans, so it's appropriate to listen and accept it.'

source_sentence: 母告子言：『汝父信受外道，深著婆羅門法，汝等應往白父，與共俱去。』
translation: The mother told her son, 'Your father is a believer in the teachings of non-Buddhists and is deeply attached to the teachings of Brahmans; you should go to your father and tell him that you're leaving with him.'

source_sentence: 淨藏、淨眼合十指爪掌白母：『我等是法王子，而生此邪見家。』
translation: Jingzang and Jingye joined their palms with their ten fingers and paws and said to their mother, 'We're princes of the Dharma, and we were born into this family of mistaken views.'

source_sentence: 母告子言：『汝等當憂念汝父，為現神變，若得見者，心必清淨，或聽我等，往至佛所。』
translation: The mother told her son, 'You must grieve for your father as a miraculous sign; if you could see him, your minds would be purified, or you might listen to us and go to the Buddha.'

source_sentence: 於是二子念其父故，踊在虛空，高七多羅樹，現種種神變——於虛空中行住坐臥；身上出水、身下出火，身下出水、身上出火；或現大身滿虛空中，而復現小，小復現大；於空中滅，忽然在地；入地如水，履水如地。
translation: Because they were mindful of their father, the two sons rose up in the sky, towered over seven tāla trees, and performed various miraculous feats-walking, standing, sitting, and lying down in the sky; water coming out of their bodies, fire coming out of their bottoms, water coming out of their bottoms, and fire coming out of their bottoms; a large body appearing to fill the sky, then a small body appearing, and a small body appearing to be large; ceasing in the sky, suddenly they were on the ground; entering the ground like water, and walking on water like the ground.

source_sentence: 現如是等種種神變，令其父王心淨信解。
translation: These various miraculous powers purify the father's mind and convince him to believe in them.

source_sentence: 時父見子神力如是，心大歡喜，得未曾有，合掌向子言：『汝等，師為是誰，誰之弟子？』
translation: Seeing his son's miraculous powers like this, the father was greatly elated and attained unprecedented success, joining his palms together and saying to his son, 'You guys, who's the teacher or whose disciple is he?'

source_sentence: 二子白言：『大王！
translation: The two sons said in vain, 'Great king!

source_sentence: 彼雲雷音宿王華智佛，今在七寶菩提樹下法座上坐，於一切世間天人眾中廣說法華經，是我等師，我是弟子。』
translation: That cloud of thunderous sounds, the Constellation King Flower Wisdom Buddha, is sitting on his Dharma throne under the seven-jewel bodhi tree, expounding the Lotus Sutra among all the world's gods and humans, and he's our teacher and I'm his disciple.'

source_sentence: 父語子言：『我今亦欲見汝等師，可共俱往。』
translation: The father said to the son, 'Now, I also want to meet your teacher, so we can go together.'

source_sentence: 於是二子從空中下，到其母所，合掌白母：『父王今已信解，堪任發阿耨多羅三藐三菩提心。
translation: Then the two sons descended from the sky to their mother, put their palms together, and said to her, 'Now, Father, you've believed and understood that you're capable of arousing the mind of unsurpassed, correct, and complete enlightenment.

source_sentence: 我等為父已作佛事，願母見聽，於彼佛所出家修道。』
translation: We have done Buddha-works for our father, and we hope our mother will see and hear us leave home and train at that Buddha's place.'

source_sentence: 「爾時二子欲重宣其意，以偈白母：「『願母放我等，　　出家作沙門，　　諸佛甚難值，　　我等隨佛學。
translation: "It was then that the two sons wanted to reiterate their intention and said to their mother in verse, "May our mother release us to leave home and become ascetics, for it's very difficult to meet the buddhas, and we'll follow them in their training.

source_sentence: 如優曇鉢羅，　　值佛復難是，　　脫諸難亦難，　　願聽我出家。』
translation: Just like Udumbara, it's even more difficult to meet the Buddha, and it's also difficult to escape the difficulties, so please let me leave home.'

source_sentence: 「母即告言：『聽汝出家。
translation: "Mother then told him, 'I'll allow you to leave home.'

source_sentence: 所以者何？
translation: Why is that?

source_sentence: 佛難值故。』
translation: It's difficult to meet the Buddha.'

source_sentence: 「於是二子白父母言：『善哉，父母！
translation: "The two sons then said to their parents, 'Good, parents!

source_sentence: 願時往詣雲雷音宿王華智佛所，親近供養。
translation: May I then go to the Flower Wisdom Buddha, the king of the thundering constellations, and make offerings to him.

source_sentence: 所以者何？
translation: Why is that?

source_sentence: 佛難得值，如優曇鉢羅華，又如一眼之龜，值浮木孔。
translation: The Buddha is difficult to attain, like the udumbara flower or like a one-eyed tortoise that meets a hole in a floating log.

source_sentence: 而我等宿福深厚，生值佛法，是故父母當聽我等，令得出家。
translation: Because of our deep past fortune, we were born into the Buddha's teachings, so our parents will listen to us and allow us to leave home.

source_sentence: 所以者何？
translation: Why is that?

source_sentence: 諸佛難值，時亦難遇。』
translation: The buddhas are difficult to meet, and the times are difficult to encounter.'

source_sentence: 「彼時妙莊嚴王後宮八萬四千人，皆悉堪任受持是法華經。
translation: "At the time, 84,000 people in the palace behind King Miaozhuangyan were all capable of accepting and upholding this Lotus Sutra.

source_sentence: 淨眼菩薩，於法華三昧，久已通達；淨藏菩薩，已於無量百千萬億劫通達離諸惡趣三昧，欲令一切眾生離諸惡趣故。
translation: The Jing-eye Bodhisattva had long since mastered the Lotus Absorption Samādhi, and the Jingzang Bodhisattva had mastered the Absorption from Evil Transmigrations Samādhi for measureless hundreds of thousands of millions of eons, wanting to cause all sentient beings to part with the evil destinies.

source_sentence: 其王夫人，得諸佛集三昧，能知諸佛祕密之藏。
translation: The king's wife has attained the samādhi of the buddha assembly and can know the hidden treasures of the buddhas.

source_sentence: 「二子如是以方便力善化其父，令心信解，好樂佛法。
translation: "Thus, these two sons used the power of their skillful means to skillfully teach their father, convincing him to love and understand the Buddha's teaching.

source_sentence: 於是妙莊嚴王與群臣眷屬俱，淨德夫人與後宮婇女眷屬俱，其王二子與四萬二千人俱，一時共詣佛所。
translation: Then, the king of marvelous adornment and his retinue, the lady of pure virtue and her retinue in the harem, and the king's two sons and 42,000 people all visited the Buddha's place at once.

source_sentence: 到已，頭面禮足，繞佛三匝，却住一面。
translation: When they arrived, they bowed their heads and feet, circled the Buddha three times, and withdrew to one side.

source_sentence: 「爾時彼佛為王說法，示教利喜。
translation: "At the time, that Buddha taught the king a lesson and showed him how to benefit and rejoice.

source_sentence: 王大歡悅。
translation: The king was greatly delighted.

source_sentence: 爾時妙莊嚴王及其夫人，解頸真珠瓔珞，價直百千，以散佛上，於虛空中化成四柱寶臺，臺中有大寶床，敷百千萬天衣，其上有佛結加趺坐，放大光明。
translation: At the time, the king and his wife, the king of marvelous adornment, untied their necks and necklaces and scattered a hundred thousand beads and jewelry worth a hundred thousand pieces on top of the Buddha, transforming them into a four-pillar jeweled platform in the sky, with a large jeweled bed covered with a hundred million pieces of heavenly robes and a Buddha sitting cross-legged on top of it, radiating brightly.

source_sentence: 爾時妙莊嚴王作是念：『佛身希有，端嚴殊特，成就第一微妙之色。』
translation: At the time, the king of marvelous adornment thought, 'The Buddha's body is rare and extraordinarily endowed with the most subtle form.'

source_sentence: 時雲雷音宿王華智佛告四眾言：『汝等見是妙莊嚴王，於我前合掌立不？
translation: The Buddha of Flower Knowledge, the constellation king of Megha-dundubhi, addressed the four groups of people, saying, 'Do you see this wonderfully adorned king standing with his palms together in front of me?'

source_sentence: 此王於我法中作比丘，精勤修習，助佛道法，當得作佛，號娑羅樹王，國名大光，劫名大高王。
translation: This king who becomes a monk in my order and diligently cultivates it, aiding the Buddha's path, will become a buddha, called Śāla Tree King, whose kingdom is called Great Radiance and whose eon is called Great High King.

source_sentence: 其娑羅樹王佛，有無量菩薩眾及無量聲聞，其國平正，功德如是。』
translation: That Śāla Tree King Buddha has an innumerable assembly of bodhisattvas and measureless śrāvakas, and his kingdom is peaceful and correct, with qualities like these.'

source_sentence: 其王即時以國付弟，與夫人、二子并諸眷屬，於佛法中出家修道。
translation: The king then entrusted his disciples with the kingdom, his wife, two sons, and their retinues, and left home to train in the Buddha's teachings.

source_sentence: 「王出家已，於八萬四千歲，常勤精進修行妙法華經。
translation: "After leaving home, the king cultivated the Lotus Sutra with constant diligence and effort for 84,000 years.

source_sentence: 過是已後，得一切淨功德莊嚴三昧，即昇虛空，高七多羅樹，而白佛言：『世尊！
translation: After that, he attained the sublime concentration of all pure attributes, rose into the sky, reached seven tāla trees, and said to the Buddha, 'Bhagavān!

source_sentence: 此我二子，已作佛事，以神通變化轉我邪心，令得安住於佛法中，得見世尊。
translation: These are my two sons who have done Buddha-works and used miraculous powers and transformations to change my wrong mind, so that I can abide in the Buddha's teachings and see the Bhagavān.

source_sentence: 此二子者，是我善知識，為欲發起宿世善根，饒益我故，來生我家。』
translation: These two sons are my good teachers who came to my house in order to give rise to the good roots of past lives and to benefit me.'

source_sentence: 「爾時，雲雷音宿王華智佛告妙莊嚴王言：『如是，如是！
translation: "It was then that the Buddha of Meruṣṭhila, the Constellation King of Thunderbolts, addressed the Vaiśravaṇa, saying, 'So it is!

source_sentence: 如汝所言。
translation: As you say.

source_sentence: 若善男子、善女人，種善根故，世世得善知識，其善知識，能作佛事，示教利喜，令入阿耨多羅三藐三菩提。
translation: 'If good men and good women plant good roots, they'll attain good friends from generation to generation, and those good friends will be able to perform Buddha-works, show and teach them for their benefit, and cause them to enter unsurpassed, correct, and complete enlightenment.'

source_sentence: 大王！
translation: Great king!

source_sentence: 當知善知識者是大因緣，所謂化導令得見佛，發阿耨多羅三藐三菩提心。
translation: You should know that a good teacher is the great cause and condition that guides, causes, and leads to a vision of the Buddha, and arouses the mind of unsurpassed, correct, and complete enlightenment.

source_sentence: 大王！
translation: Great king!

source_sentence: 汝見此二子不？
translation: Do you see these two sons?

source_sentence: 此二子，已曾供養六十五百千萬億那由他恒河沙諸佛，親近恭敬，於諸佛所受持法華經，愍念邪見眾生，令住正見。』
translation: 此二子，已曾供養六十五百千萬億那由他恒河沙諸佛，親近恭敬，於諸佛所受持法華經，愍念邪見眾生，令住正見。』

source_sentence: 妙莊嚴王即從虛空中下，而白佛言：『世尊！
translation: The king of marvelous adornment then descended from the sky and said to the Buddha, 'Bhagavān!

source_sentence: 如來甚希有，以功德智慧故，頂上肉髻光明顯照，其眼長廣而紺青色，眉間毫相白如珂月，齒白齊密常有光明，脣色赤好如頻婆菓。』
translation: The Tathāgata is quite rare; it's the result of his excellent wisdom, the brightness of his topknot that shines through, the length and breadth of his eyes that are deep blue, the tuft of hair between his eyebrows that's as white as the moon, the whiteness and density of his teeth that are always shining, and the red color of his lips that's like a fruit of the vibhāga.'

source_sentence: 「爾時妙莊嚴王，讚歎佛如是等無量百千萬億功德已，於如來前，一心合掌，復白佛言：『世尊！
translation: "After praising the Buddha for these measureless hundreds of thousands of millions of merits, the king of marvelous adornment joined his palms with one heart and said to the Buddha, 'Bhagavān!

source_sentence: 未曾有也。
translation: Never has it existed before.

source_sentence: 如來之法，具足成就不可思議微妙功德，教誡所行，安隱快善，我從今日，不復自隨心行，不生邪見、憍慢、瞋恚諸惡之心。』
translation: Because the Tathāgata's teaching is replete with unfathomably subtle qualities and instructs those who practice it to be peaceful and pleasant, I will no longer conduct myself according to my mind or give rise to bad thoughts like wrong views, pride, and anger from this day forward.'

source_sentence: 說是語已，禮佛而出。」
translation: After speaking these words, he paid homage to the Buddha and departed."

source_sentence: 佛告大眾：「於意云何？
translation: The Buddha addressed the crowd, "What do you think?

source_sentence: 妙莊嚴王，豈異人乎？
translation: Is the king of sublime adornment someone else?

source_sentence: 今華德菩薩是。
translation: The present-day Flower Power Bodhisattva is this.

source_sentence: 其淨德夫人，今佛前光照莊嚴相菩薩是。
translation: The Lady of Pure Virtue is the present-day Bodhisattva Shining Vairocana before the Buddha.

source_sentence: 哀愍妙莊嚴王及諸眷屬故，於彼中生。
translation: She was born there because she had compassion for the king of marvelous adornment and his retinue.

source_sentence: 其二子者，今藥王菩薩、藥上菩薩是。
translation: Those two sons are the present-day Yakṣa King and Yakushō Bodhisattva.

source_sentence: 是藥王、藥上菩薩，成就如此諸大功德，已於無量百千萬億諸佛所殖眾德本，成就不可思議諸善功德。
translation: These Medicine King and Yakushō Bodhisattva have accomplished such great virtues that they have already produced unfathomable good qualities in the innumerable hundreds of thousands of millions of buddha-places where they have accumulated numerous virtues.

source_sentence: 若有人識是二菩薩名字者，一切世間諸天人民亦應禮拜。」
translation: If anyone knows the names of these two bodhisattvas, the gods and people of the world should venerate them."

source_sentence: 佛說是妙莊嚴王本事品時，八萬四千人遠塵離垢，於諸法中得法眼淨。
translation: When the Buddha spoke this chapter on the skillful means of the king of marvelous adornment, 84,000 people became dustless and spotless and attained purification of the Dharma eye among all dharmas.

source_sentence: 妙法蓮華經普賢菩薩勸發品第二十八爾時普賢菩薩，以自在神通力，威德名聞，與大菩薩無量無邊不可稱數，從東方來。
translation: Miaofa lianhua jing puxian pusa xuanfa pin 28 At the time, the Bodhisattva Puxian, with his unimpeded supernormal powers, authoritative virtue, and reputation, and great bodhisattvas of measureless and limitless incalculability, came from the east.

source_sentence: 所經諸國，普皆震動，雨寶蓮華，作無量百千萬億種種伎樂。
translation: All the countries they passed through were shaken, and they rained down jeweled lotus flowers and created measureless hundreds of thousands of millions of millions of kinds of music.

source_sentence: 又與無數諸天、龍、夜叉、乾闥婆、阿修羅、迦樓羅、緊那羅、摩睺羅伽、人非人等，大眾圍繞，各現威德神通之力，到娑婆世界耆闍崛山中，頭面禮釋迦牟尼佛，右繞七匝，白佛言：「世尊，我於寶威德上王佛國，遙聞此娑婆世界說法華經，與無量無邊百千萬億諸菩薩眾共來聽受，唯願世尊當為說之。
translation: They were surrounded by countless gods, dragons, yakṣas, gandharvas, asuras, garuḍas, kiṃnaras, mahoragas, humans and non-humans, each manifesting the power of their authority and superknowledge when they arrived at the Śākya world on Mount Gṛdhrakūṭa, bowed their heads to Śākyamuni Buddha, circled him seven times to his right, and said to him, "Bhagavān, I've heard this sūtra on the Lotus taught in the Śākya world from afar in the Buddha Land of Jeweled, Majestic, and Incalculable, One Hundred Thousand Thousand Thousand Trillion Bodhisattvas have come to listen to it, so please let the Bhagavān teach it for us.

source_sentence: 若善男子、善女人，於如來滅後，云何能得是法華經？」
translation: If good sons and good women, how can they attain this Lotus Sutra after the Tathāgata has ceased?"

source_sentence: 佛告普賢菩薩：「若善男子、善女人，成就四法，於如來滅後，當得是法華經：一者、為諸佛護念，二者、殖眾德本，三者、入正定聚，四者、發救一切眾生之心。
translation: The Buddha told Samantabhadra, "If good sons and good women accomplish four things, they will attain this Lotus Sutra after the Tathāgata's death: 1) Being mindful of the Buddhas, 2) Producing the roots of virtue in multitudes, 3) Entering the cluster of right concentration, and 4) Giving rise to the intention to save all sentient beings.

source_sentence: 善男子、善女人，如是成就四法，於如來滅後，必得是經。」
translation: Good sons and good women, if you thus accomplish these four things, you will surely attain this sūtra after the Tathāgata's cessation."

source_sentence: 爾時普賢菩薩白佛言：「世尊！
translation: It was then that the Bodhisattva Samantabhadra said to the Buddha, "Bhagavān!

source_sentence: 於後五百歲、濁惡世中，其有受持是經典者，我當守護，除其衰患，令得安隱，使無伺求得其便者，若魔、若魔子、若魔女、若魔民、若為魔所著者，若夜叉、若羅剎、若鳩槃茶、若毘舍闍、若吉遮、若富單那、若韋陀羅等，諸惱人者，皆不得便。
translation: "For the next five hundred years, in a world that's turbid and evil, if someone accepts this sūtra, I will guard them, remove their troubles, make them comfortable, and prevent them from seeking their own advantage, whether it's Māra, Māra's son, Māra's daughter, Māra's people, someone attached to Māra, a yakṣa, a rāṣa, a kumbhāṇḍa, a piśāca, a piśāca, a piṭaka, a pūtana, a vetāla, or any other person who bothers people, they won't be able to get help.

source_sentence: 是人若行、若立、讀誦此經，我爾時乘六牙白象王，與大菩薩眾俱詣其所，而自現身，供養守護，安慰其心，亦為供養法華經故。
translation: If someone walks or stands and recites this sūtra, I'll ride the six-tusked white elephant king with a large group of bodhisattvas to their place, present myself, make offerings, guard, and comfort their minds, also for the purpose of making offerings to the Lotus Sutra.

source_sentence: 是人若坐、思惟此經，爾時我復乘白象王現其人前，其人若於法華經有所忘失一句一偈，我當教之，與共讀誦，還令通利。
translation: If that person sits down and contemplates this sūtra, then I'll again ride the white elephant king and show up in front of them, and if they forget a single verse or sentence of the Lotus Sutra, I'll teach them, recite it together, and return it to them for their benefit.

source_sentence: 爾時受持讀誦法華經者，得見我身，甚大歡喜，轉復精進，以見我故，即得三昧及陀羅尼，名為旋陀羅尼、百千萬億旋陀羅尼、法音方便陀羅尼，得如是等陀羅尼。
translation: At that point, the person who accepts and recites the Lotus Sutra is greatly elated to see me in person, and he turns out to be energetic; because he sees me, he attains samādhi and dhāraṇī called the revolving dhāraṇī, the hundred thousand million revolving dhāraṇī, and the dhāraṇī of the Dharma sound of skillful means, and he attains such dhāraṇī.

source_sentence: 「世尊！
translation: "Bhagavān!

source_sentence: 若後世後五百歲、濁惡世中，比丘、比丘尼、優婆塞、優婆夷，求索者、受持者、讀誦者、書寫者，欲修習是法華經，於三七日中，應一心精進。
translation: "If in the next five hundred years or in a degenerate age, monks, nuns, laymen, or laywomen who seek, accept, recite, or write this Lotus Sutra want to cultivate it, they should apply themselves with one mind for thirty-one days.

source_sentence: 滿三七日已，我當乘六牙白象，與無量菩薩而自圍繞，以一切眾生所憙見身，現其人前，而為說法，示教利喜，亦復與其陀羅尼呪，得是陀羅尼故，無有非人能破壞者，亦不為女人之所惑亂，我身亦自常護是人。
translation: After the thirty-seven days are up, I will ride in a six-tusked white elephant, surround myself with measureless bodhisattvas, and present myself to all sentient beings in their jealousy-viewing bodies to preach to them and show them how to benefit and delight in them, and I will also give them a dhāraṇī spell; because I have obtained this dhāraṇī, there's no one who isn't capable of destroying it, and I won't be confused by a woman, and I myself will always protect this person.

source_sentence: 唯願世尊聽我說此陀羅尼呪。」
translation: Please let the Bhagavān hear me recite this dhāraṇī spell."

translation: 即於佛前而說呪曰：「阿檀地(途賣反)(一)檀陀婆地(二)檀陀婆帝(三)檀陀鳩舍隷(四)檀陀修陀隷(五)修陀隷(六)修陀羅婆底(七)佛馱波羶禰(八)薩婆陀羅尼阿婆多尼(九)薩婆婆沙阿婆多尼(十)修阿婆多尼(十一)僧伽婆履叉尼(十二)僧伽涅伽陀尼(十三)阿僧祇(十四)僧伽波伽地(十五)帝隷阿惰僧伽兜略(盧遮反)阿羅帝婆羅帝(十六)薩婆僧伽三摩地伽蘭地(十七)薩婆達磨修波利剎帝(十八)薩婆薩埵樓馱憍舍略阿[少/兔]伽地(十九)辛阿毘吉利地帝(二十)「世尊！

source_sentence: 若有菩薩得聞是陀羅尼者，當知普賢神通之力，若法華經行閻浮提，有受持者，應作此念：『皆是普賢威神之力。』
translation: If a bodhisattva hears this dhāraṇī, he should know the power of Samantabhadra's supernormal abilities, and if there's someone who accepts the Lotus Sutra as it travels through Jambudvīpa, they should think, 'It's all the power of Samantabhadra's authority.'

source_sentence: 若有受持、讀誦，正憶念，解其義趣，如說修行，當知是人行普賢行，於無量無邊諸佛所深種善根，為諸如來手摩其頭。
translation: If someone accepts it, recites it, correctly recollects it, understands its meaning and aims, and cultivates it as it's taught, they should know that this person's practice of Samantabhadra profoundly plants good roots in measureless and limitless buddha-places and rubs their hands on their heads for the tathāgatas.

source_sentence: 若但書寫，是人命終，當生忉利天上，是時八萬四千天女作眾伎樂而來迎之，其人即著七寶冠，於婇女中娛樂快樂；何況受持、讀誦，正憶念，解其義趣，如說修行。
translation: If someone only writes, that person will be born in the Heaven of Thirty-three when their life ends, and 84,000 goddesses will make multitudes of music to welcome them, and that person will then wear a crown of seven treasures and entertain and be happy among the women, not to mention retaining, reciting, correctly recollecting, understanding their meaning and purpose, and cultivating them as they've been taught.

source_sentence: 若有人受持、讀誦，解其義趣，是人命終，為千佛授手，令不恐怖，不墮惡趣，即往兜率天上彌勒菩薩所。
translation: If someone retains and recites it, understands its meaning and aims, then they'll be given the hand of a thousand buddhas at the end of their life, so that they won't be afraid and won't fall into a bad destiny, and they'll go up to Maitreya Bodhisattva in Tuṣita Heaven.

source_sentence: 彌勒菩薩，有三十二相大菩薩眾所共圍繞，有百千萬億天女眷屬，而於中生，有如是等功德利益。
translation: That Maitreya Bodhisattva is surrounded by a great multitude of bodhisattvas in thirty-two forms and has hundreds of thousands of millions of goddesses as his retinue, and he'll have such merits and benefits when he's born in the midst of them.

source_sentence: 是故智者，應當一心自書、若使人書，受持、讀誦，正憶念，如說修行。
translation: Therefore, wise ones, you should single-mindedly write or cause others to write, memorize, recite, and correctly recall it, and practice it as explained.

source_sentence: 「世尊！
translation: "Bhagavān!

source_sentence: 我今以神通力故，守護是經，於如來滅後閻浮提內，廣令流布，使不斷絕。」
translation: Now, by virtue of my supernormal powers, I will guard this sūtra and cause it to be widely disseminated in Jambudvīpa after the Tathāgata's disappearance so that it doesn't cease."

source_sentence: 爾時釋迦牟尼佛讚言：「善哉，善哉！
translation: It was then that Śākyamuni Buddha praised him, "Good, good!

source_sentence: 普賢！
translation: Samantabhadra!

source_sentence: 汝能護助是經，令多所眾生安樂利益。
translation: "You can protect and aid this sūtra, which will bring well-being and benefit to many sentient beings.

source_sentence: 汝已成就不可思議功德，深大慈悲，從久遠來，發阿耨多羅三藐三菩提意，而能作是神通之願，守護是經。
translation: You have achieved unfathomable virtue, profound compassion, and the resolve to achieve unsurpassed, correct enlightenment since long ago, and you can make this miraculous vow to guard this sūtra.

source_sentence: 我當以神通力，守護能受持普賢菩薩名者。
translation: With my supernormal powers, I will guard someone who can bear the name of Samantabhadra Bodhisattva.

source_sentence: 「普賢！
translation: "Samantabhadra!

source_sentence: 若有受持、讀誦，正憶念，修習、書寫是法華經者，當知是人，則見釋迦牟尼佛，如從佛口聞此經典；當知是人，供養釋迦牟尼佛；當知是人，佛讚善哉；當知是人，為釋迦牟尼佛手摩其頭；當知是人，為釋迦牟尼佛衣之所覆。
translation: "If someone accepts, recites, correctly remembers, cultivates, and writes this Lotus Sutra, they should know that this person sees Śākyamuni Buddha and hears this sūtra from his mouth; they should know that this person makes offerings to Śākyamuni Buddha; they should know that this person is praised by the Buddha as good; they should know that this person rubs his head with Śākyamuni Buddha's hand; and they should know that this person is covered by Śākyamuni Buddha's robe.

source_sentence: 如是之人，不復貪著世樂，不好外道經書、手筆，亦復不喜親近其人及諸惡者——若屠兒、若畜猪羊雞狗、若獵師、若衒賣女色——是人心意質直，有正憶念，有福德力，是人不為三毒所惱，亦復不為嫉妬、我慢、邪慢、增上慢所惱，是人少欲知足，能修普賢之行。
translation: Such a person doesn't crave worldly pleasures, doesn't cultivate the writing of scriptures or the writing with the hands of non-Buddhists, and doesn't like to be close to others and bad people - whether they're butchers of children, herding pigs, sheep, chickens, or dogs, hunters, or those who sell women for sex - but this person is straightforward in mind, has right mindfulness, and has the power of good fortune.

source_sentence: 「普賢！
translation: "Samantabhadra!

source_sentence: 若如來滅後後五百歲，若有人見受持、讀誦法華經者，應作是念：『此人不久當詣道場，破諸魔眾，得阿耨多羅三藐三菩提，轉法輪、擊法鼓、吹法螺、雨法雨，當坐天人大眾中師子法座上。』
translation: If someone sees, accepts, and recites the Lotus Sutra 500 years after the Tathāgata's death, they should think, 'Soon this person will enter the site of enlightenment, refute the armies of Māra, attain unsurpassed, perfect enlightenment, turn the Dharma wheel, beat the Dharma drum, blow the Dharma conch, and rain the Dharma rain, and will sit on the Dharma throne of the lion among the great multitude of gods.'

source_sentence: 「普賢！
translation: "Samantabhadra!

source_sentence: 若於後世，受持、讀誦是經典者，是人不復貪著衣服、臥具、飲食、資生之物，所願不虛，亦於現世得其福報。
translation: If someone accepts and recites these sūtras in a later life, that person will no longer cling to clothing, bedding, food, or things that provide for life, and their wishes won't be in vain; they'll also attain their merit in the present life.

source_sentence: 若有人輕毀之，言：『汝狂人耳，空作是行，終無所獲。』
translation: If someone despises them, they'll say, 'You're a madman! You do this in vain! You'll never get anything!'

source_sentence: 如是罪報，當世世無眼；若有供養讚歎之者，當於今世得現果報。
translation: The result of such a sin will be invisible from generation to generation, but if someone makes offerings and praises them, they'll attain the results of their actions in the present life.

source_sentence: 若復見受持是經者，出其過惡，若實、若不實，此人現世得白癩病。
translation: If someone who accepts this sūtra and teaches about its faults, whether real or unreal, that person will develop leprosy in the present life.

source_sentence: 若有輕笑之者，當世世牙齒踈缺，醜脣、平鼻，手腳繚戾，眼目角睞，身體臭穢，惡瘡、膿血、水腹、短氣、諸惡重病。
translation: If someone despises them, in the future life they'll have missing teeth, ugly lips, a flat nose, crooked hands and feet, eyes and horns, a foul-smelling body, bad sores, pus and blood, a watery stomach, shortness of breath, and other serious illnesses.

source_sentence: 是故，普賢！
translation: Therefore, Samantabhadra!

source_sentence: 若見受持是經典者，當起遠迎，當如敬佛。」
translation: If you see someone who accepts this sūtra, you must rise and greet them from afar, as you would a Buddha."

source_sentence: 說是普賢勸發品時，恒河沙等無量無邊菩薩，得百千萬億旋陀羅尼；三千大千世界微塵等諸菩薩，具普賢道。
translation: When this chapter of the encouragement of Samantabhadra was taught, measureless and limitless bodhisattvas like the Ganges River Sands attained a hundred thousand million million revolving dhāraṇīs, and bodhisattvas like the dust of the three thousand great thousand worlds became endowed with the path of Samantabhadra.

source_sentence: 佛說是經時，普賢等諸菩薩，舍利弗等諸聲聞，及諸天、龍、人非人等，一切大會，皆大歡喜，受持佛語，作禮而去。
translation: When the Buddha spoke this sūtra, the entire assembly of Bodhisattvas like Samantabhadra, śāriputra and other śrāvakas, gods, dragons, humans and non-humans rejoiced greatly, accepted the Buddha's words, paid homage, and departed.

source_sentence: 妙法蓮華經卷第七
translation: Sutra of the Lotus of the Wonderful Dharma, Volume 7

source_sentence: 妙法蓮華經後序
translation: Preface after the Sutra on the Lotus of the Wonderful Dharma

source_sentence: 後秦沙門僧叡述
translation: Commentary of the Latter Qin śramaṇa Senryō

source_sentence: 《法華經》者，諸佛之祕藏，眾經之實體也。
translation: "The Lotus Sutra is the secret store of the buddhas and the substance of all the scriptures.

source_sentence: 以華為名者，照其本也；稱芬陀利者，美其盛也。
translation: It's called the flower because it illuminates its origin, and it's called the puṇḍarī because it's beautiful and abundant.

source_sentence: 所興既玄，其旨甚婉，自非達識傳之，罕有得其門者。
translation: It's so profound in what it produces and so refined in its intent that few people who haven't attained knowledge will be able to follow its teachings.

source_sentence: 夫百卉藥木之英，物實之本也；八萬四千法藏者，道果之原也，故以喻焉。
translation: The buddha of the hundred flowers and medicinal trees is the origin of things in their true form, and the 84,000 dharma stores are the origin of the fruit of the path, so we use that as a metaphor.

source_sentence: 諸華之中，蓮華最勝，華尚未敷，名屈摩羅；敷而將落，名迦摩羅；處中盛時，名芬陀利。
translation: Among the flowers, the lotus is the most distinguished, and when it's not yet in full bloom, it's called a kumāra; when it's in full bloom and about to fall, it's called a kāmalā; and when it's in full bloom, it's called a puṇḍarī.

source_sentence: 未敷喻二道，將落譬泥洹，榮曜獨足以喻斯典。
translation: It's a metaphor for the two paths before it's in full bloom, and it's a metaphor for nirvāṇa when it's about to fall; its glory alone is a good metaphor for this kind of scripture.

source_sentence: 至如《般若》諸經，深無不極，故道者以之而歸；大無不該，故乘者以之而濟；然其大略，皆以適化為大；應務之門，不得不以善權為用。
translation: As for the Prajñāpāramitā sūtras, they are both profound and limitless, so those on the path take them as refuge; they are great and uncalled for, so those on the vehicle take them as relief; but their outlines are all based on the idea that adapting and transforming is the greatest, and the approach of responding to work has to be based on the use of good authority.

source_sentence: 權之為化，悟物雖弘，於實體不足，皆屬《法華》，固其宜矣。
translation: Although the power of transformation is great for awakening things, it's not enough for the substance, and it's certainly appropriate that they all belong to the Lotus Sutra.

source_sentence: 尋其幽旨，恢廓宏邃，所該甚遠，豈徒說實歸本，畢定殊塗而已耶？
translation: Inquiring into its profound meaning, it's broad and profound, and what should be done is far-reaching, so isn't it just to discuss the real and return to the source and to settle on something different?

source_sentence: 乃實大明覺理，囊括古今。
translation: "It's really a great insight into the principles of awakening that encompasses the past and present.

source_sentence: 云佛壽無量，永劫未足以明其久也；分身無數，萬形不足以異其體也。
translation: It's said that a Buddha's life span is immeasurable, but a long eon isn't long enough to explain it; a divided body is countless, and ten thousand forms aren't enough to distinguish its essence.

source_sentence: 然則壽量定其非數，分身明其無實，普賢顯其無成，多寶照其不滅。
translation: Then, the lifespan is definitely not numbered, the divided body is clearly defined as insubstantial, Samantabhadra shows its incompleteness, and Prabhūtaratna illuminates its nonceasing nature.

source_sentence: 夫邁玄古以斯今，則萬世同一日；即萬化以悟玄，則千途無異轍。
translation: When he steps forward from the profound past to the present, then all the worlds will be the same day; when he realizes the profound through the myriad transformations, then there will be no difference in a thousand paths.

source_sentence: 夫如是者，則生生未足以期存，永寂亦未可言其滅矣。
translation: If this is the case, then birth is not yet sufficient for existence, and eternal extinction can't yet be said to have ceased.

source_sentence: 尋幽宗以絕往，則喪功於本無；控心轡於三昧，則忘期於二地。
translation: If we look into the esoteric schools to cut off the past, we'll lose our efforts in the original nothingness; if we control our mind and dance in samādhi, we'll forget about the future in the two realms.

source_sentence: 經流茲土，雖復垂及百年，譯者昧其虛津，靈關莫之或啟；談者乖其准格，幽蹤罕得而履；徒復搜研皓首，竝未有窺其門者。
translation: Although the scriptures have been handed down to this land for another hundred years, the translators have been ignorant of its openings, and the spiritual gates have never been opened; the discussants have failed to follow its standards, and the traces of the esoteric have rarely been traced; we have searched and studied it again, but we have yet to see its entrance.

source_sentence: 秦司隷校尉左將軍安城侯姚嵩，擬韻玄門，宅心世表，注誠斯典，信詣彌至，每思尋其文，深識譯者之失。
translation: Yao Song, the left general of the Qin superintendent of schools, Ancheng Hou, was a man who wanted to learn the language of the profound gate, who was dedicated to the worldly table, who was sincere about the scriptures, and who had reached a great level of faith, who always searched the text and was deeply aware of the translator's errors.

source_sentence: 既遇鳩摩羅法師，為之傳寫，指其大歸真，若披重霄而高蹈，登崑崙而俯盻矣。
translation: When he met the master Kumāra, he wrote a transmission for him, pointing out that it was a great return to the truth, as if he were climbing high above the heavens and ascending to Kunlun and gazing down at it.

source_sentence: 于時聽受領悟之僧八百餘人，皆是諸方英秀，一時之傑也。
translation: At the time, there were more than 800 monks who had heard and received the awakening, all of them bright and talented from different directions and of the same time.

source_sentence: 是歲弘始八年，歲次鶉火。
translation: It was the eighth year of Hongsi's reign, and the year was marked by the quail fire.
